oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Citizens Cemetery
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Cemeteries
African American cemeteries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Citizens Cemetery in Tiptonville, Tennessee.

Citizens Cemetery is located in Tiptonville, in Lake County, and was the African American cemetery in that town. As with so many other aspects of life during segregation, cemeteries were also often segregated by race.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Center for Historic Preservation, Middle Tennessee State University
